= Algebra Agent =
This is an agent that can solve simple algebra problems with one variable. It parses raw text input from [Domains_SoarTextIO Soar Text I/O] into a tree structure, solves the problem in that representation and then prints out the answer.

=== Soar capabilities ===
  * Hierarchical task decomposition
  * Chunking
